author: David Laris
method: Mix all the ingredients in a bowl.
ingredients: 50g/2oz black Kalamata olives ,  3 medium tomatoes, diced into 2cm/¾in cubes,  1 cucumber peeled, diced into 2cm/¾in cubes ,  1 red pepper, de-seeded, diced ,  ½ red onion, sliced finely ,  100ml/3fl oz extra virgin olive oil ,  150g/5oz feta, diced ,  1 small, firm cos lettuce, chopped into rough cubes lengthways  ,  1 generous sprig of oregano (or 2 tsp dried oregano) ,  50ml/3 tbsp red wine vinegar
